alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Pembina; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 7:08AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...BRIEF FREEZING RAIN IN NORTHERN RED RIVER VALLEY THIS MORNING... A mix of snow and light freezing rain is moving across the northern Red River Valley this morning. With ground temperatures below freezing, there will be scattered hazardous travel conditions. Temperatures will rapidly increase by mid-morning. If traveling in these areas this morning, slow down, don`t use cruise control, and prepare for slippery roads. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov For current road conditions in Minnesota, visit 511mn.org.

area.areaDesc: Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Pembina; Western Walsh County
